Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Isn't this the place where you told
me that you didn't want to be with me?
What's gotten into you now?
<PAGE>
Ordinarily, I would think of it as a
girl playing hard to get, but I honestly
don't think you're that clever.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Is it possible that you only realized
recently that you like me? What's going
on in that little head of yours?
<PAGE>
Come on, <MYNAME>. Do you really wanna be
my girlfriend or what?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ACTION_RIBBON>If you really want to be with me that
badly, I guess I have no choice but to
go out with you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That means you're my girl now. You
better do your best to make sure you
don't lose my favor.
<PAGE>
While we're at it, do you wanna change
what we call each other? Like maybe use
more romantic names. Any requests?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> what you want to be called?
Yes
No

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, got it.
<PAGE>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Now that you're dating me,
don't you go and get eyes for anyone
else.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oops, look at the time. I've got to take
off. See ya later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Okay <MYNAME>, let me just double check
here.
<PAGE>
Is this ring... really for me? I'm not
just imagining things, right?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Even after you turned me down, I
couldn't give up on you. I felt so much
pain.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><ACTION_RIBBON>That's why I'm so happy now that I could
almost cry. Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I can hardly believe that this is really
happening. It feels like a dream to have
you declare your feelings for me now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Let's use this as an opportunity to
change what we call each other.
<PAGE>
We'll feel more like a couple that way.
So what do you think I should call you?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> good with you?
Yes
No

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, got it. <MYNAME> it is.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I have something to take care of,
so I need to be on my way. Sorry I can't
see you home.
<PAGE>
Till next time, <MYNAME>. Here's to us!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Now, <MYNAME>, I know that people's
feelings can change, but you're not the
only person who can change their mind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Unfortunately, I don't want to go out
with you anymore. In love, timing is
everything.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Even if I were to say something like
that, you're innocent and stubborn, so
you probably wouldn't give up.
<PAGE>
Just in case, I'm going to ask you one
more time. You really do want to be
with me, right, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see... Well, if you're that serious
about it, I'm game too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><ACTION_RIBBON>From today on we're a couple.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now that we're officially sweethearts,
why don't we change what we call each
other? Should make things more exciting.
<PAGE>
What do you want me to call you? Give it
a bit of thought now.
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> good with you?
Yes
No

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. I like the ring of that. It's
cute. What's that? You want me to
stop treating you like a child now?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>At this point, it's a force of
habit. I'm so used to it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>And you're just too cute,
my little <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is the start of a fresh stage for
us. Let's give it our best.
<PAGE>
Oops, I forgot about some minor business
I have to take care of. I'll be on my
way then. See you soon, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
To think that you, <MYNAME>, have
feelings for me... I'm so surprised.
<PAGE>
...Honestly, I thought that my feelings
of love for you had gone away.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But now I know that I was just fooling
myself.
<PAGE>
My feelings are as strong as ever.
<MYNAME>, please allow me the honor of
accepting your ring.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you very much. Let us further
strengthen our relationship... as
sweethearts.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not used to being in a relationship,
so I may make mistakes, but please know
that I want very much to be with you.
<PAGE>
And now that we're a couple, I suppose
I shouldn't speak so stiffly to you.
<PAGE>
Would you like me to call you by a
new nickname?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> do?
Yes
No

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
It still doesn't quite roll off my
tongue. It may take a little time for me
to really get used to saying it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, it's gotten late.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. I must excuse myself
as I have some business to attend to.
<PAGE>
Well then, see you soon. Please have a
safe trip home.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Come on. You turned me down before. What
are you doing going and declaring your
feelings for me now?!
<PAGE>
After what you did to me...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I guess there's still no way I could
hate you. In fact, I still like you very
much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You really do have feelings for me,
right? Do you really want to start going
out with me or what?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>I-I see. I suppose that means I'll give
dating you a try.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
But... I don't really have any idea how
to proceed from here.
<PAGE>
Ah, yes. Don't people normally change
what they call each other at times like
this?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Can't really think of anything myself
right now. How about you? You want me
to call you something else or what?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> okay with you?
Yes
No

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Alright, I've got it. Call me what you
wish. But no funny names! Okay?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well, it seems that's decided. I'll be
heading home now. See ya, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Honestly, I'm shocked. I had no idea
that you would confess to me like this.
<PAGE>
Now don't misunderstand me. I'm not
saying I'm displeased about this. I'm
actually very happy.
<PAGE>
I wanted to give up on you, but I
couldn't do it. I even started feeling
sorry for myself.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>So this makes me very happy. Thank you,
<MYNAME>. I care for you too.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I suppose this makes us a proper couple,
<MYNAME>. I hope for the best going
forward.
<PAGE>
To show that we really are sweethearts,
I think it would be nice to change what
we call each other. Any preferences?
My name is fine as it is
Change what he calls you

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> how you want me to refer to
you?
Yes
No

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You know, <MYNAME>, from now on you can
always rely on me. Let me know anytime
you find yourself in a bind.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, look at the time. I'm sorry,
<MYNAME>. I must leave you now as I have
something to take care of.
<PAGE>
I really am most sorry I can't see you
home. Please have a safe journey back.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wow! I haven't been this surprised in a
long time. I mean, there haven't been
any big scoops recently, you know?
<PAGE>
But that's not the point. Are you really
serious, <MYNAME>?! I'm not just
imagining things right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I mean, you already turned me down once,
so this seems too good to be true.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ACTION_RIBBON><MYNAME>! I'm so happy! I feel the same
way about you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well, first things first. Wanna come up
with new names to call each other? I
mean, it's what sweethearts would do!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What would you like me to call you from
now on?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> good with you?
Yes
No

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've got it, <MYNAME>! Let's get to know
each other better... as boyfriend and
girlfriend of course.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, it's already that late?! I wish I
could stay a little longer.
<PAGE>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. I've got something urgent
to take care of. Come see me again soon.
Take care!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Does that ring you showed
me mean that you want me to be your
girlfriend?
<PAGE>
If that's what you want, I'd really like
if you showed me that ring again.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha! Yay! You know, <MYNAME>, I was
actually wondering whether I should try
declaring my feelings to you again.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Of course my answer is yes!<RED>∀</RED> Thank
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy to get a ring!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, that's right. What should I call you
from now on? Want to change it to
something more fitting of sweethearts?!
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes
No

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME> it is.<RED>∀</RED> Here's to us!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oops... Looks like I'm out of time. I
have something I need to take care
of. Too bad.
<PAGE>
Sorry for taking off first. You'll come
see me again soon, right? You know I'll
be waiting eagerly!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which reminds me... That ring.
<PAGE>
That's the kind of thing that's used
when professing one's love... Am I
wrong?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><ACTION_RIBBON>I'm so happy. I-I feel the same way...
So we're... in a relationship now?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yes. We should change what we call
each other. That's what's done, right? I
read about it in a book...
<PAGE>
What should I call you? Let me know...
please.
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> okay?
Yes
No

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay... I've got it. <MYNAME>, please
continue to treat me well...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah... I've got to tell mother. She'll
be so happy...
<PAGE>
Well then... <MYNAME>. See you soon.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Am I correct in assuming that you just
professed your feelings for me?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, how could you confess to me now,
after I had finally decided to give up
on you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>... Are you sure that you want me
as your girlfriend?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you very much. I accept.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well... Now that we're in a
relationship, want to change what we
call each other?
<PAGE>
Actually... I've been looking forward to
doing something like that ever since I
was a little girl. If it's all right...
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall I call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> from now on?
Yes
No

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I understand. Well then, <MYNAME>, let's
give this relationship our best.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh no, it's already quite late. Please
excuse me, I have some business I need
to attend to.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, take care of yourself. Well
then, see you soon.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Alright, this seems like a fine place.
Hey <MYNAME>, please show me that ring
one more time.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Even after you turned me down, I never
stopped having feelings for you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>I'm glad I didn't give up. <MYNAME>, I
want to be your girlfriend.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Given the special occasion, how about we
change up what we call each other as a
symbol of our love?<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I suppose we could also just call each
other by our regular names. What do you
think?
My name is fine as it is
Change what she calls you

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> okay with you?
Yes
No

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME> it is then. I hope to hear you
calling my name more often now as well.
<PAGE>
After all, just hearing you say my name
is enough to make me happy!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, I must be going as I have
something to take care of.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, now that you're my boyfriend,
please come over to see me often!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I knew you liked me, little <MYNAME>.
Anyway, hurry up and show me that ring
again.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ACTION_RIBBON>I can't believe it took you this long to
profess your feelings. But it's okay I
guess. I'll go out with you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, what's that? If we're going to be in
a relationship you want me to call you
by a different name?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Too much of a pain, sorry. <MYNAME> is
just fine. Don't complain too much or
I'll have to reconsider dating you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, yes. It's fine how it is.
<PAGE>
More importantly, now that we're a
couple, you better be a willing subject
for all my experiments.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All that sound okay, <MYNAME>? You better
be good to me now. See ya later.
